nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddFacility" text="Add Facilities" minWidth="90">
          
          
            
                            <toggleGroup>
          
          
            
                                <ToggleGroup fx:id="toggleGroup"/>
          
          
            
                            </toggleGroup>
          
          
            
                        </ToggleButton>
          
          
            
                        <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddBarrier" toggleGroup="$toggleGroup" text="Add Barrier" onAction="#createBarrier"
          
          
            
                                      minWidth="90"/>
          
          
            
                        <fx:define>
          
          
            
                            <ToggleGroup fx:id="toggleGroup"/>
          
          
            
                        </fx:define>
          
          
            
                        <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddFacility" text="Add Facilities" minWidth="90" toggleGroup="$toggleGroup"/>
          
          
            
                        <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddBarrier" text="Add Barrier"  minWidth="90"  toggleGroup="$toggleGroup" onAction="#createBarrier"/>

+<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
 <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?>
 <?import javafx.scene.control.ProgressIndicator?>
 <?import javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton?>
 <?import javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup?>
-<?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?>
 <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?>
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?>
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
 <?import com.esri.arcgisruntime.mapping.view.MapView?>
-
-<StackPane fx:controller="com.esri.samples.service_area_task.ServiceAreaTaskController" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml"
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.Background?>
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.BackgroundFill?>
+<?import javafx.scene.paint.Color?>
+<StackPane fx:controller="com.esri.samples.service_area_task.ServiceAreaTaskController"
+           xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml"
            stylesheets="/style.css">
-           
+
     <!--SDK SceneView-->
     <MapView fx:id="mapView"/>
     <!-- For loading service areas -->
     <ProgressIndicator fx:id="progressIndicator" maxHeight="50.0" maxWidth="50.0" visible="false"/>
-    
-    <!-- Top bar button select -->
-    <HBox StackPane.alignment="TOP_LEFT" maxWidth="200" maxHeight="50">
-      <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddFacility" text="Add Facilities" minWidth="200">
-      <toggleGroup>
-        <ToggleGroup fx:id="toggleGroup"/>
-        </toggleGroup>
-      </ToggleButton>
-      <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddBarrier" toggleGroup="$toggleGroup" text="Add Barrier"  onAction="#createBarrier" minWidth="200"/>
-      <Button text="Show Service Areas" onAction="#showServiceAreas" minWidth="200"/>
-      <Button text="Reset" onAction="#clearRouteAndGraphics" minWidth="200"/>
-    </HBox>  
-</StackPane>
\ No newline at end of file
+
+    <!-- Controls area -->
+    <VBox StackPane.alignment="TOP_LEFT" maxWidth="180" maxHeight="50" spacing="10">
+        <padding>
+            <Insets topRightBottomLeft="10"/>
+        </padding>
+
+        <background>
+            <Background>
+                <fills>
+                    <BackgroundFill>
+                        <fill>
+                            <Color opacity="0.3"/>
+                        </fill>
+                    </BackgroundFill>
+                </fills>
+            </Background>
+        </background>
+
+        <HBox>
+            <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddFacility" text="Add Facilities" minWidth="90">
+                <toggleGroup>
+                    <ToggleGroup fx:id="toggleGroup"/>
+                </toggleGroup>
+            </ToggleButton>
+            <ToggleButton fx:id="btnAddBarrier" toggleGroup="$toggleGroup" text="Add Barrier" onAction="#createBarrier"
+                          minWidth="90"/>

nodes.bodyText: Good point, I've gone ahead and put all the styling in the CSS file. Perhaps we can do this with samples going forward? Makes the FXML look nice and clean.
